entry.title: What's new in 2010?
entry.summary: I know I know, a lot of time has passed and i released nothing new, but hope you'll stick with mucms.

entry.title: Mucms Switching to Jquery for the backend
entry.summary: I decided it was faster to develop a backend with alredy builtin javascript API than building all by myself, so I switched to JQuery and JQuery UI.

entry.title: RSS syndication feature added
entry.summary: Essential for any website but lacking in MuCMS, the RSS generation is added now and conforms (AND VALIDATES) to the Atom format.

entry.summary: As of 2009, I started improving the backend in order to make posting the easiest possible.

entry.title: Table prefix for multi installs added
entry.summary: If you want to install multiple MicroCMS on one database, you should use different prefixes

summary.p: Since MuCMS is design to be light and fast, the backend as well as the front end should be faster either.

entry.title: Welcome to MicroCMS !
entry.summary: MicroCMS is designed for simplicity and loading speed. It runs with the template engine Smarty.
